summary: This is an overhaul of the Haven Bag MOD by Haishao.
descriptionHtml:
This changes the interior of Haven Bag entirely (see screenshots). This adds follower support (vanilla and Serana) that will teleport you and your current follower to and from this Safe-Room. I did not test the teleportation function on any of the popular follower mods because I don't use them: Only for vanilla handled followers (those in the follower faction). This took some serious trial and error scripting to target an NPC without an actual reference. It is not a summon spell: when you teleport to the haven bag, so will your current follower. As stated above, it works for vanilla followers and Serana, I tried it with Isran but it didn't work, worked with Ingjard, Lydia and that wierd chick who wants you to help her kill her mother.

*Version 1.1 - Added a new set of Dwemer crafting stations: these use stock textures so they may have a few weird spots, but should be compatible with any texture mod you may have. The storage is new, if you are updating from the illuminated version, you need to remove your items from the storage containers (you can put them in the coffins, those are fine).Â 


*Note - This will conflict with the original Haven-bag containers (I don't know why but I deleted them and made new ones). So be sure to save before trying this out.

Requires:
Dawnguard
Hearthfires


Credits:

Meridia Candle Statue by SrRamrod
House Decorations - Plants and Flowers by Toddkay
Haven Bag by Haishao

Permissions:

Whatever you want to do with this you can.
author: Sticz
